mapper.update: update chat_list set yn = 'Y' where seq = ${seq}
mapper.select: select chat_list.*,mentor.nickname mentorname,mentee.nickname menteename from chat_list join members mentee on chat_list.mentee = mentee.code join members mentor on chat_list.mentor = mentor.code where mentor = #{loginID} or mentee = #{loginID}
select count(*) from chat_list where seq = ${seq} and ( mentor = ${code} or mentee = ${code} )
select * from chat_list where mentor = ${mentor} and mentee = ${mentee}
